info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 12:56AM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected to continue. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 14 inches with locally higher amounts near 15 inches in northwest Connecticut expected. Winds gusting as high as 30 to 40 mph in the higher terrain areas. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts and mid Hudson Valley and eastern Catskills. * WHEN...Through 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult tonight due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates up to one inch per hour at times tonight. Snowfall rates up to 2 inches per hour at times are possible in the eastern Catskills.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
